Description:
GRANT AWARD TO CASE WESTERN RESERVE UNIVERSITY (CWRU) CONTRIBUTES TO NNSA’S STOCKPILE STEWARDSHIP MISSION BY 
ESTABLISHING A UNIQUE PUBLIC-PRIVATE PARTNERSHIP MERGING MATERIALS SCIENCE WITH NOVEL COMPUTER SCIENCE AND DATA 
SCIENCE TO ADVANCE THE UNDERSTANDING OF FUNDAMENTAL MECHANISMS OF MATERIALS DEGRADATION AND FAILURE IN OUR 
NUCLEAR STOCKPILE MATERIALS AND COMPONENTS, THROUGH COMBINED RESEARCH AND EDUCATIONAL MULTI-DISCIPLINARY VISION. 
PROJECT TITLE: CENTER TO MATERIALS DATA SCIENCE FOR STOCKPILE STEWARDSHIP (MDS3) COE
